mapper.select: SELECT houseNo FROM cw_base_house WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT t2.enumType AS 'type', t2.enumName AS 'label', t2.enumValue AS 'value', COUNT(id) AS 'number' FROM cw_base_house t1 LEFT JOIN cw_base_enum t2 ON t1.peopleRelation = t2.enumValue AND t2.enumType ='peopleRelation'
t1.peopleRelation is NOT NULL
AND t1.villageCode =#{villageCode}
GROUP BY t1.peopleRelation

SELECT t1.id, t1.villageCode, t1.buildingNo, t1.unitNo, t1.houseNo, t1.floor, t1.peopleRelation, t1.houseType, t1.gisType, t1.lon, t1.lat, t1.createTime, t1.updateTime, t1.status, t1.thirdId, IFNULL(t1.address,CONCAT(t3.villageName,t1.buildingNo,'栋',unitNo,'单元',houseNo,'室')) AS address, t2.buildingName, t3.villageName FROM cw_base_house t1 LEFT JOIN cw_base_building t2 ON t1.buildingNo = t2.buildingNo AND t1.villageCode = t2.villageCode LEFT JOIN cw_base_village t3 ON t1.villageCode = t3.villageCode WHERE t1.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update cw_base_house set STATUS = -1 WHERE id=#{id}

update cw_base_house
villageCode = #{villageCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
buildingNo = #{buildingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
houseNo = #{houseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
floor = #{floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
peopleRelation = #{peopleRelation,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
gisType = #{gisType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
unitNo = #{unitNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lon = #{lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
alt = #{alt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
updateTime = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
thirdId = #{thirdId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach:
update cw_base_house
floor = #{item.floor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
peopleRelation = #{item.peopleRelation,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
houseType = #{item.houseType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
gisType = #{item.gisType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
lon = #{item.lon,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
lat = #{item.lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
alt = #{item.alt,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
address = #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
